name: Pearl Izumi Pro Tall Socks - Men's
description:
Low-profile cycling socks with a small footprint. The breathable Repreve® polyester is made from recycled plastic bottles, feeling great on your feet and on the planet.Midfoot band holds socks in place.Forefoot mesh vents excess heat.Seamless toe for chafe-free wear.

        Sustainability
